response.overview: The National Archaeological Museum of Naples shows visitors things they can no longer see in Pompeii: the breathtaking treasure trove of finds that tell us so much about life in the Roman Empire -- The sensational frescos and mosaics, but also pots and pans, locks and drinking glasses: and last but not least erotic fantasies so explicit that they were kept under lock and key for decades.  And then there are the incomparable works of classical art from the Fornese Collection; the treasures in the National Archaeological Museum reveal the ancient world in all its diversity and tell the exciting story of its rediscovery.
response.title: The Treasures Of Pompeii
